Articles.Content:
Good day to all!

I wanted to post my hello thread to introduce myself and also to say how excited I am to have found this wonderful game. Not only is this a game I have dreamed about for quite a long time, but the community in general is far and above the nicest I have had the pleasure of becoming part of in a very long time.

I am a 46yo computer engineer who does sound editing for a hobby. In addition I worked for Bioware for 2 years as an 'unpaid' core tester for SWTOR. That was a fun, yet frustrating experience. One I have to say I don\'t have any desire to repeat...at least not with a major publisher.

I have been an avid gamer since the C64 days, and my favorite games were 'Project Space Station' & 'Buzz Aldrin\'s Race into Space'. You can imagine how excited I am for this project then!

Well, I wont bore you anymore other than to say you guys are great (both the dev\'s and the community) and I look forward to getting to know you all better!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Exploding!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Monkatraz

Avid RP Forum Poster

Had to do it Slunky...:U

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
